channel.title: PK-Destiny | OSRS PK SERVER | REFUNDING OSRS-PVP DONATORS | FREQUENT UPDATES
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yIx8N1m.png[/img]
[url=http://"http://www.pk-destiny.com"]Home[/url] [url=http://"http://www.pk-destiny.com/download/PK-Destiny.jar"]Download Client (.Jar)[/url] [url=http://"http://www.pk-destiny.com/vote"]Vote[/url]
[I]NOTE: The Website is still under construction. (Landing page coming soon)[/I]
Staff Team:
Owner: [USER]Pale[/USER] Developer: [USER]levawesome[/USER]
[B]General Info: PK-Destiny is a fast growing OSRS Based PK-Server, aiming for excellence. We want to provide our players activity, frequent updates and an amazing journey at our Server. We are a remake of OSRS-PvP, trying to provide better content than what they ever had. Our dedicated and carefully picked Staff Team will help you enjoy your gameplay even more! Our amazing Economy will never get you bored! Come and give us a shot![/B]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]NOTE: [/SIZE][/FONT][SIZE=3]WE ARE REFUNDING OSRS-PVP DONATORS TILL FEBRUARY 24th! GET YOUR RANK NOW BY APPLYING ON THE FORUMS WITH LEGIT PROOF.[/SIZE]
[SPOILER=Latest Major Updates @ PK-Destiny]
[CODE]Note that this might not be everything, as we might have forgotten some minor things, but here they are folks:
- Donators recieve 10 percent Spec back ea kill, Super donators 25 percent, and Extreme donators 50 percent spec back ea kill. - PK'ing above level 30 rewards you double PKP. However, you may not get double PKP when killing a person on your own IP adress, or repeatedly killing a person which you already killed. - Bank tabs are now added (Note that you have to right click the tabs and click view in order to view it, as we came across a bug which we havent resolved yet) - Quest tab is now active. You can see some very interesting Server Information there! - Donator Shop is now added and priced. Do ::donate ingame to navigate yourself to the Donation Page. (Keep in mind that the Donation Page is just a temporary page, we are working on it) - Armadyl Crossbow now has a accurate speed - The PK shops are now priced correctly, to make the eco nice and stable. (Suggestions are available!) - You can now see the Freeze and veng timers at the side of the client! Do ::commands to see the toggleable commands you can use. - Dragonfire Shield now has a Operate and special attack system. Have fun! - Darkbow now works! - PK Teleports are now added into the game. - NEW PK TAB! View it by clicking the respective icon in game! (The armour headed guy :P) - We have now optimized our server start-up to make it more efficient. It has been significantly improved for our own gameplay. - Saradomin, Guthix and Zamorak cape are now kept on death! You can purchase them by visiting the PVP Shop! - A few teleports have been added. Please do ::commands ingame to view them. - Tab to reply has now been added! You no longer have to stress and click on the person you want to message! - Donator Points system have now been added! - Mage Bank can be entered now. The Webs are just a temporary fix! You will have a laugh when you try to cut the webs. - Antiposion (4) has now been added to the Potion Shop. - Mystic robe top glitch has now been patched. You no longer see your arm when wearing it. - Removed useless dead codes. - Updated Client to its latest version
What you can expect in the future: Full Clipping Bank Tabs fixed. AutoCast Quick Prayers Resizable Screen HD Textures (ground, water etc) Fully reworked Combat. Smoother Switching Ice blitz timers Correct Range formulas Kree'ara rangeable, not meleeable (facepalm)
Website Updates: Auto Donate added! Auto Vote Added! IPB Installed and completed. Working on Landing page (expect this soon)[/CODE] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Videos] [video]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HyvWh6wA2qg[/video] [video=youtube;9WKiwpJ_5-g]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9WKiwpJ_5-g[/video] [video=youtube;svJCHh7vQ6w]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=svJCHh7vQ6w[/video] [video=youtube;TjeF8LrEVE8]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TjeF8LrEVE8[/video] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Client Media] [IMG]https://www.upload.ee/image/5586315/client_background.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Server Media] [IMG]https://www.upload.ee/image/5586370/lAmSMcE.png[/img] [IMG]https://www.upload.ee/image/5586373/SbSIrvv.png[/img] [IMG]https://www.upload.ee/image/5586375/JgnQx0x.png[/img] [IMG]https://www.upload.ee/image/5586380/Tl7hOAt.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Website/Forum Media] [IMG]https://www.upload.ee/image/5586391/Screenshot_16.png[/img] [IMG]https://www.upload.ee/image/5586395/Screenshot_15.png[/img] [/SPOILER]

item.title: PK-Destiny | OSRS PK SERVER | REFUNDING OSRS-PVP DONATORS | FREQUENT UPDATES
item.dc:creator: @PK-Destiny PK-Destiny
item.description:
@PK-Destiny wrote:

Home
Download Client (.Jar)
Vote

[I]NOTE: The Website is still under construction. (Landing page coming soon)[/I]

Staff Team:

Owner: [USER]Pale[/USER]
Developer: [USER]levawesome[/USER]

[B]General Info: PK-Destiny is a fast growing OSRS Based PK-Server, aiming for excellence. We want to provide our players activity, frequent updates and an amazing journey at our Server. We are a remake of OSRS-PvP, trying to provide better content than what they ever had. Our dedicated and carefully picked Staff Team will help you enjoy your gameplay even more! Our amazing Economy will never get you bored! Come and give us a shot![/B]

[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]NOTE: [/SIZE][/FONT][SIZE=3]WE ARE REFUNDING OSRS-PVP DONATORS TILL FEBRUARY 24th! GET YOUR RANK NOW BY APPLYING ON THE FORUMS WITH LEGIT PROOF.[/SIZE]

[SPOILER=Latest Major Updates @ PK-Destiny]

[CODE]Note that this might not be everything, as we might have forgotten some minor things, but here they are folks:

  • Donators recieve 10 percent Spec back ea kill, Super donators 25 percent, and Extreme donators 50 percent spec back ea kill.
  • PK’ing above level 30 rewards you double PKP. However, you may not get double PKP when killing a person on your own IP adress, or repeatedly killing a person which you already killed.
  • Bank tabs are now added (Note that you have to right click the tabs and click view in order to view it, as we came across a bug which we havent resolved yet)
  • Quest tab is now active. You can see some very interesting Server Information there!
  • Donator Shop is now added and priced. Do ::donate ingame to navigate yourself to the Donation Page. (Keep in mind that the Donation Page is just a temporary page, we are working on it)
  • Armadyl Crossbow now has a accurate speed
  • The PK shops are now priced correctly, to make the eco nice and stable. (Suggestions are available!)
  • You can now see the Freeze and veng timers at the side of the client! Do ::commands to see the toggleable commands you can use.
  • Dragonfire Shield now has a Operate and special attack system. Have fun!
  • Darkbow now works!
  • PK Teleports are now added into the game.
  • NEW PK TAB! View it by clicking the respective icon in game! (The armour headed guy :P)
  • We have now optimized our server start-up to make it more efficient. It has been significantly improved for our own gameplay.
  • Saradomin, Guthix and Zamorak cape are now kept on death! You can purchase them by visiting the PVP Shop!
  • A few teleports have been added. Please do ::commands ingame to view them.
  • Tab to reply has now been added! You no longer have to stress and click on the person you want to message!
  • Donator Points system have now been added!
  • Mage Bank can be entered now. The Webs are just a temporary fix! You will have a laugh when you try to cut the webs.
  • Antiposion (4) has now been added to the Potion Shop.
  • Mystic robe top glitch has now been patched. You no longer see your arm when wearing it.
  • Removed useless dead codes.
  • Updated Client to its latest version

What you can expect in the future:
Full Clipping
Bank Tabs fixed.
AutoCast
Quick Prayers
Resizable Screen
HD Textures (ground, water etc)
Fully reworked Combat.
Smoother Switching
Ice blitz timers
Correct Range formulas
Kree’ara rangeable, not meleeable (facepalm)

Website Updates:
Auto Donate added!
Auto Vote Added!
IPB Installed and completed.
Working on Landing page (expect this soon)[/CODE]
[/SPOILER]
